30#include <sys/param.h>
31#include <sys/types.h>
32
33#include <limits.h>
34#include <stdio.h>
35#include <unistd.h>
36
37#include <atf-c.h>
38
39#include "test_helpers.h"
40#include "user.h"
41
42/* ---------------------------------------------------------------------
43 * Test cases for the free functions.
44 * --------------------------------------------------------------------- */
45
46ATF_TC(euid);
47ATF_TC_HEAD(euid, tc)
48{
49 atf_tc_set_md_var(tc, "descr", "Tests the atf_user_euid function");
50}
51ATF_TC_BODY(euid, tc)
52{
53 ATF_REQUIRE_EQ(atf_user_euid(), geteuid());
54}
55
56ATF_TC(is_member_of_group);
57ATF_TC_HEAD(is_member_of_group, tc)
58{
59 atf_tc_set_md_var(tc, "descr", "Tests the atf_user_is_member_of_group "
60 "function");
61}
62ATF_TC_BODY(is_member_of_group, tc)
63{
64 gid_t gids[NGROUPS_MAX];
65 gid_t g, maxgid;
66 int ngids;
67 const gid_t maxgid_limit = 1 << 16;
68
69 {
70 int i;
71
72 ngids = getgroups(NGROUPS_MAX, gids);
73 if (ngids == -1)
74 atf_tc_fail("Call to getgroups failed");
75 maxgid = 0;
76 for (i = 0; i < ngids; i++) {
77 printf("User group %d is %u\n", i, gids[i]);
78 if (maxgid < gids[i])
79 maxgid = gids[i];
80 }
81 printf("User belongs to %d groups\n", ngids);
82 printf("Last GID is %u\n", maxgid);
83 }
84
85 if (maxgid > maxgid_limit) {
86 printf("Test truncated from %u groups to %u to keep the run time "
87 "reasonable enough\n", maxgid, maxgid_limit);
88 maxgid = maxgid_limit;
89 }
90
91 for (g = 0; g < maxgid; g++) {
92 bool found = false;
93 int i;
94
95 for (i = 0; !found && i < ngids; i++) {
96 if (gids[i] == g)
97 found = true;
98 }
99
100 if (found) {
101 printf("Checking if user belongs to group %d\n", g);
102 ATF_REQUIRE(atf_user_is_member_of_group(g));
103 } else {
104 printf("Checking if user does not belong to group %d\n", g);
105 ATF_REQUIRE(!atf_user_is_member_of_group(g));
106 }
107 }
108}
109
110ATF_TC(is_root);
111ATF_TC_HEAD(is_root, tc)
112{
113 atf_tc_set_md_var(tc, "descr", "Tests the atf_user_is_root function");
114}
115ATF_TC_BODY(is_root, tc)
116{
117 if (geteuid() == 0)
118 ATF_REQUIRE(atf_user_is_root());
119 else
120 ATF_REQUIRE(!atf_user_is_root());
121}
122
123ATF_TC(is_unprivileged);
124ATF_TC_HEAD(is_unprivileged, tc)
125{
126 atf_tc_set_md_var(tc, "descr", "Tests the atf_user_is_unprivileged "
127 "function");
128}
129ATF_TC_BODY(is_unprivileged, tc)
130{
131 if (geteuid() != 0)
132 ATF_REQUIRE(atf_user_is_unprivileged());
133 else
134 ATF_REQUIRE(!atf_user_is_unprivileged());
135}
136
137/* ---------------------------------------------------------------------
138 * Main.
139 * --------------------------------------------------------------------- */
140
141ATF_TP_ADD_TCS(tp)
142{
143 ATF_TP_ADD_TC(tp, euid);
144 ATF_TP_ADD_TC(tp, is_member_of_group);
145 ATF_TP_ADD_TC(tp, is_root);
146 ATF_TP_ADD_TC(tp, is_unprivileged);
147
148 return atf_no_error();
149}
